item.title: White House slashing staff in major overhaul of National Security Council, officials say
item.description: President Donald Trump is ordering a major overhaul of the National Security Council that will shrink its size.

item.title: Trump touts changes to military in campaign-style West Point graduation address
item.description: Trump promoted an "America First" worldview and he highlighted the strength of the U.S. military.

item.title: Defense Secretary Hegseth, bedeviled by leaks, orders more restrictions on press at Pentagon
item.description: Bedeviled by leaks to the media during his short tenure, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth issued a series of restrictions on the press late Friday.

item.title: U.S. orders Trump administration to facilitate the return of Guatemalan deportee
item.description: Murphy, an appointee of Trump's Democratic predecessor Joe Biden, called the case a "horror."

item.title: Trump calls for 50% tariff on EU, says he's 'not looking for a deal' with bloc
item.description: President Donald Trump believes European Union proposals have not matched those from other trading partners, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent sai...
